Title: Orruk Ardboys
Legend: Mobs of Ardboys plough into the fray to the sound of booming war-drums and the clatter of heavy iron plate. Each Ardboy is a ferocious, battle-scarred fighter,smashing his way through the ranks of the enemy with a variety of crude but deadly weapons.
Intro: Each model in an Orruk Ardboys unit is armed with Ardboy Choppas. Up to 2 in every 5 models the unit can also have an Orruk-forged Shield.

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be an Ardboy Boss. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapons.

Rules.Name: Standard Bearer
Rules.Rule: STANDARD BEARER: 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Gorkamorka Glyph Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of a unit that includes any Gorkamorka Glyph Bearers.

Rules.Name: Musician
Rules.Rule: MUSICIAN: 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Waaagh! Drummer. You can add 1 to charge rolls for a unit that includes any Waaagh! Drummers.

Rules.Name: Drawn To The Waaagh!
Rules.Fluff: The powerful beat drummed out by a Warchanter draws ever more Ardboys to the fight.
Rules.Rule: Drawn to the Waaagh!: If this unit’s champion issues the Rally command to this unit while this unit is wholly within 12" of a friendly WARCHANTER, you can return 1 slain model to this unit for each roll of a 4+ instead of a 6.

Rules.Name: Orruk-Forged Shields
Rules.Fluff: Ardboy shields are almost as tough as the orruks who carry them.
Rules.Rule: Orruk-forged Shields: A model that has an Orruk-forged Shield has a ward of 6+.
